title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Jessica Stahl on 06/16/2022

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the officers who arrested Jessica Stahl. She was taken into custody by the Parker Police Department on June 16, 2022, after fatally striking a pedestrian—25-year-old Lacy Lewis—while allegedly under the influence of heroin and other substances. After initially stopping, Stahl asked if she had hit someone but failed to call 911 or render aid, remaining in her car for nearly six minutes. She later fled when approached by officers, leading them on a short high-speed chase before being stopped. Following her arrest, she was found to have extensive heroin use and had a young child in the vehicle during the incident. Stahl was later convicted on multiple felony charges, including vehicular homicide. I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from officers who interacted with Stahl during the investigation, traffic stop, pursuit, arrest, and any DUI testing procedures.

Suspect’s Name:
Jessica Stahl

Type of Crime:
Vehicular Homicide (DUI), Child Abuse, Leaving the Scene of an Accident, DUI with Bodily Injury

Date of the Arrest:
06/16/2022

Time of the Arrest:
Shortly after 2:00 AM

Location of the Arrest:
Intersection of Parker Road and Cottonwood Drive, Parker, CO


Arresting Agency:
Parker Police Department, Douglas County, CO

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani

title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Angelina Washburn on or around 12/09/2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the officers who arrested Angelina Washburn. She was taken into custody by the Trinidad Police Department on or around December 9, 2023, after officers responded to a call about a vehicle reportedly striking a person on a bicycle. Officers located the bicycle at the scene but not the rider, and later found the vehicle and the driver—24-year-old Washburn—a few blocks away. She was arrested on charges including DUI and child abuse (knowingly or recklessly). I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from the officers who responded to the scene, located Washburn, and conducted the DUI investigation and arrest.

Suspect’s Name:
Angelina Washburn

Type of Crime:
DUI, Child Abuse (Knowingly or Recklessly)

Date of the Arrest:
12/09/2023 

Location of the Arrest:
Near the vicinity of a bike collision in Trinidad, Colorado (exact street not listed)


Agency/County:
Trinidad Police Department, Las Animas County, Colorado

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani

title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Augusta Naggie on 09/23/2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the deputies who arrested Augusta Naggie. She was taken into custody by the Habersham County Sheriff’s Office on the night of September 23, 2023, after crashing a white Toyota Camry while allegedly driving under the influence. The vehicle flipped, crossed the median, and came to rest on top of a guardrail on GA 15/441 North near Hollywood. Two people were injured and transported to the hospital. Naggie was charged with DUI, reckless driving, underage alcohol consumption, and other traffic-related offenses. I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from the deputies who responded to the crash and conducted the arrest.

Suspect’s Name:
Augusta Naggie

Type of Crime:
DUI, Reckless Driving, Speeding, Underage Consumption, Possession of Open Alcohol Containers

Date of the Arrest:
09/23/2023 (Saturday night)

Time of the Arrest:
Night (exact time not specified)

Location of the Arrest:
GA 15/441 North near Hollywood, Habersham County, GA

Arresting Agency:
Habersham County Sheriff’s Office

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani

title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Robert Medlock on 01/16/2023

communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Robert Medlock on 01/16/2023
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the officers who arrested Robert Medlock. He was taken into custody by the Evansville Police Department on January 16, 2023, following a violent encounter near Fourth Avenue and Georgia Street. According to reports, Medlock was stopped while riding a bicycle after running a stop sign. He displayed signs of drug possession, resisted arrest, and attempted to flee. A prolonged struggle followed, including multiple deployments of a Conducted Electrical Weapon (CEW), during which Medlock allegedly struck an officer in the face. After escaping, he armed himself with an axe and barricaded himself in a garage. Officers eventually removed him and placed him in handcuffs. I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from all officers who engaged with Medlock during the stop, struggle, pursuit, and final arrest.

Suspect’s Name:
Robert Medlock

Type of Crime:
Battery on Law Enforcement, Resisting Arrest, Possession of Methamphetamine, Obstruction, Burglary

Date of the Arrest:
01/16/2023

Time of the Arrest:
Approximately 4:25 PM

Location of the Arrest:
Intersection of Fourth Ave & Georgia St, Evansville, IN (and nearby detached garage at 1100 block of Georgia St)

Arresting Agency:
Evansville Police Department (Vanderburgh County)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani

title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Lakenry Roberts on 01/23/2023

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Lakenry Roberts on 01/23/2023
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the officers who arrested Lakenry B. Roberts. He was taken into custody by the Valdosta Police Department on January 23, 2023, after being found asleep behind the wheel at the intersection of West Magnolia Street and N St. Augustine Road around 2:20 AM. Upon waking him, officers observed signs of impairment and discovered Roberts had a handgun. After a brief conversation, Roberts fled the scene on foot and was apprehended shortly after. He was charged with DUI, possession of a firearm by a convicted felon, obstruction of an officer, suspended license, and open container. I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from the responding officers who made contact with Roberts, removed the weapon, and took him into custody following the foot pursuit.

Suspect’s Name:
Lakenry B. Roberts

Type of Crime:
DUI, Possession of a Firearm by a Convicted Felon, Obstruction, Suspended License, Open Container

Date of the Arrest:
01/23/2023

Time of the Arrest:
Approximately 2:20 AM

Location of the Arrest:
Intersection of West Magnolia Street and N St. Augustine Road, Valdosta, GA


Arresting Agency: Valdosta Police Department  (booked in Lowndes County jail)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani

title: Request for Bodycam Footage – Arrest of Jason Matthew Pinch on 11/19/2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the body-worn camera footage of the deputies who arrested Jason Matthew Pinch. He was taken into custody by the Putnam County Sheriff’s Office on November 19, 2023, after reportedly causing a public disturbance near Lake Oconee while under the influence of hallucinogenic mushrooms. Dressed in a yellow chicken suit, Pinch was reported to be striking vehicles, yelling in the roadway, and banging on a patrol car and SUV. Deputies attempted to arrest him, during which he resisted, asked deputies if they were real, and was ultimately subdued with a Taser. I am requesting the available body-worn camera footage from the deputies who responded to the scene, attempted to arrest, and ultimately took Mr. Pinch into custody.
Suspect’s Name:
Jason Matthew Pinch

Type of Crime:
Disorderly Conduct, Obstruction of a Peace Officer

Date of the Arrest:
11/19/2023

Time of the Arrest:
Afternoon (exact time not listed)

Location of the Arrest:
Near East River Bend Drive, Lake Oconee area, Putnam County, GA

Agency/County:
Putnam County Sheriff’s Office

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Christopher Udeani
